testcase.name: Add Songs to List Spec "before all" hook for "should add a song to an existing list"
testcase.classname: "before all" hook for "should add a song to an existing list"

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed trying to load:
http://localhost:8000/users/b6424127-cbc5-419e-9200-35d766a9f4ba/lists
We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.
We received this error at the network level:
> Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:8000
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: http://localhost:8000/users/b6424127-cbc5-419e-9200-35d766a9f4ba/lists
-----------------------------------------------------------
Common situations why this would fail: - you don't have internet access - you forgot to run / boot your web server - your web server isn't accessible - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer
https://on.cypress.io/request
Because this error occurred during a `before all` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Add Songs to List Spec`
